pkgmetadata.longdescription: Electric Vehicle Charging Sessions Profiling and Modelling // Tools for modelling electric vehicle charging sessions into generic groups with similar connection patterns called "user profiles", using Gaussian Mixture Models clustering. The clustering and profiling methodology is described in Caigueral and Melndez (2021, ISBN:0142-0615) doi:10.1016/j.ijepes.2021.107195.
